item.title: Mikarin and Takun magic show
item.description: ##20:09 Saturday 15 November 2014 JST## After ママ received presents and while we were eating cake, Mikarin and Takumi did a magic show. Most of them were “look over there!” tricks, but in one, Mikarin did a bit of memorization / card manipulation. They didn’t Fool Us (or at least didn’t fool me), but it better than an obvious misdirect trick.
